name: Medique 3-Shelf Industrial First Aid Cabinet
description: Wall-mountable OSHA-compliant kit with 1,000+ supplies for HVAC shop or truck.
target_audience_match: Perfect for HVAC crews who need full-scale compliance and inventory in the shop or on the move.

name: First Aid Only 25-Person Contractor’s Kit
description: Compact and jobsite-ready OSHA kit for smaller HVAC teams.
target_audience_match: Ideal for HVAC techs handling installs or service calls who want a simple, compliant kit in every truck.

name: Klein Tools PPE Safety Starter Kit
description: PPE-focused kit with safety glasses, gloves, respirator — HVAC-ready protection.
target_audience_match: For HVAC techs who already have first aid handled but need OSHA-ready PPE gear they can trust.

name: Surviveware Small First Aid Kit
description: Rugged and portable first aid kit with OSHA-aligned components.
target_audience_match: Best for mobile HVAC techs working rooftops, attics, or crawlspaces who need fast access and reliability.

name: North by Honeywell First Aid Refill Pack (OSHA Class B)
description: Keep your HVAC kits OSHA-compliant with ready-to-use refills.
target_audience_match: For HVAC leads making sure truck kits stay compliant without restocking headaches.
